title: Basil Bandwagon Natural Market
description: Family owned natural products market specializes in organic produce, herbs, vitamins, health foods, foods for special diet, earth-friendly products, solar pool heaters, solar home design consultations, clean energy education and products. Certified energy consultants are on staff to assist people who want to build solar homes or retrofit existing homes to reduce their personal impact on the environment while saving money on their utility bills. Has an expanded organic produce section, organic and veggie deli items prepared daily, soups, juice bar, wraps, un-chicken and tempeh salad, etc. Offers take-away. The cafe within has a new name - The Farm to Market Cafe. It is a restaurant/juice bar, serves organic vegetarian/vegan entrees and sandwiches, juices, smoothies.
